CHAT.comment: FLORIDA, Petitioner v. ROBERT A. THOMAS
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:14 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT J. KRAUSS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CYNTHIA J. DODGE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT J. KRAUSS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:53 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
